Geolocator v2 Examples

Below is just a demonstration of some Geolocator features. This does not fully cover all Geolocator methods and options. For all capabilities and more, please read the API documentation.
Warning! HTML5 Geolocation API requires a secure origin in some browsers. For methods like geolocator.locate() to work properly click here to reload the page with HTTPS protocol.

Geolocator Configuration

geolocator.config(options)   

Language
HTTPS
Google API Key
Google Maps Version

Geo-Location (HTML5)

geolocator.locate(options, callback)      

Enable High Accuracy
Desired Accuracy meters
Timeout milliseconds
Maximum Wait milliseconds
Maximum Age milliseconds
Fallback to IP
Address Lookup
Time Zone
Create Map

Geo-Location by IP

geolocator.locateByIP(options, callback)      

Address Lookup
Time Zone
Create Map

Geo-Location by Mobile Client

geolocator.locateByMobile(options, callback)      

Mobile Country Code
Mobile Network Code
Mobile Carrier
Mode
Fallback to IP
Address Lookup
Time Zone
Create Map

Geocoding — Coordinates from Address

geolocator.geocode(options, callback)      

Address
Create Map

Reverse Geocoding — Address Lookup from Coordinates

geolocator.reverseGeocode(options, callback)      

Latitude
 
Longitude

geolocator.getTimeZone(options, callback)      

Coordinates

geolocator.getIP(callback)
